module: Module-level comment: The 'sdr_data_path' module manages data output and masking for SDRAM interfaces. On reset, it initializes output mask DQM to high-impedance; otherwise, it passes the input DM value to DQM. DATAIN is directly output to DQOUT. The module uses synchronous reset logic and parameters from 'Sdram_Params.h' for port sizes.
